title: Keen link buttons needed!
content:
I'm looking for some volunteers to create some 88x31 link images for the various Keen websites around the place. For example:
[url=http://spatang.com/ck][img]http://spatang.com/ck/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url]

Update 2007-10-22
Two new buttons have been added. The Keen Wiki (Malvineous) and Keen: The Strip (Mort01). Woot.

You can observe them at [url=http://www.planetkeen.com/]Planet Keen[/url], the Keen news site.

A partial list:
Keen:Modding
Blegd and Smeeg
CC314
[url=http://www.keengrid.net/tgmm/]The Garg's Mod Maze[/url] (defunct? Alas...)

DONE:
PCKF
Keen Wiki
[url=http://keencomic.blogspot.com/]Commander Keen: the comic strip[/url]

(Thanks go to Malvineous and Mort01 for their contributions)

There are obviously others, so feel free to add to the list and/or create a corresponding link image.

Post your work here, or email it to jimage at gmail mentioning 'keen' in the subject. I'll be adhering to a certain level of quality, but please at least give it a shot, even if it's something simple that may be used as a place-holder until something shinier appears.

PNG, GIF or zipped BMP is preferred, as these are lossless formats guaranteed to keep all the pixels in tact.

Any that I have within 48 hours will be used immediately. After that I'm disappearing for two weeks, and I'd like to get this project up and running before I leave.

title: Re: Keen link buttons needed!
content:
So you have TGMM? Waiting to see it. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] I always was going to make one for that site or KeenGrid but never got around to it, thinking nobody would link them anyways.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Keen link buttons needed!
content:
Well, as I slowly work my way through my to-do list, here are a couple of feeble attempts at link buttons for the KeenWiki:

[img]http://www.shikadi.net/wiki/keenwiki88x31a.png[/img]

[img]http://www.shikadi.net/wiki/keenwiki88x31b.png[/img]

Not sure which one I prefer...perhaps the second one as it's a little more colourful.[url=http://www.shikadi.net/keenwiki/]KeenWiki[/url] | [url=http://www.shikadi.net/moddingwiki/]ModdingWiki[/url]

title: Re: Keen link buttons needed!
content:

title: Re: Keen link buttons needed!
content:
The buttons are for the Teleporter on the left side of the Planet Keen main page. Essentially a list of links to Keen related websites.

A button for the Patch Index would be great.

content:

title: Re: Keen link buttons needed!
content:
My eyes! They BURN!

Seriously though, I can't really read the words, (At least on this moniter.) you might want to change the hue or the saturation of the red to make it a little less... stark.-----------------------
The end of this post. You may stop reading now.

content:

content: That does look good but I agree with Gal - you have to look at it really closely to read what the words say.
